alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Eastern Loudoun; Fairfax; Northwest Prince William; Spotsylvania; Stafford (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 7:02PM EST until January 06 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 2 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of a coating to an inch and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of central and northern Virginia. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 2 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as snow, sleet and freezing rain between 7 and 9 AM. Precipitation will change to rain during the late morning to early afternoon hours. Rain is expected to end during the early evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Prince William, Manassas, Manassas Park; Eastern Loudoun; Fairfax; Northwest Prince William; Spotsylvania; Stafford
